items.sentence: Tom has to stay home and take care of his children.
I think it\'s time for me to get a bit of exercise.
I\'m sure you didn\'t mean to hurt Tom\'s feelings.
Tom has been married to Mary for over thirty years.
Tom has just started serving a three year sentence.
Tom is lucky to have a woman like Mary in his life.
Tom is the person that actually pulled the trigger.
Tom is unable to decide which shirt he should wear.
Tom knew better than to try to kiss Mary in public.
Tom knew immediately that what Mary said was a lie.
Tom knew what Mary was planning to cook for dinner.
I don\'t want to hear about what you did yesterday.
I don\'t want to hurt Tom, but I will if I have to.
You don\'t have to talk so loud. I can hear you OK.
You don\'t need to speak so loudly. I can hear you.
Tom admitted that he was no match for Mary in golf.
Tom almost never does anything out of the ordinary.
Tom and Mary are growing further and further apart.
This train is crowded, so let\'s take the next one.
To the best of my knowledge, the rumor isn\'t true.
